stats.title: Statistics Cards
stats.content: View key metrics like total sales, orders, and revenue at a glance.

quickActions.title: Quick Actions
quickActions.content: Access frequently used features like New Sale, Add Product, and View Reports.

cart.title: Shopping Cart
cart.content: Add products by scanning barcode, searching, or clicking. Adjust quantities and remove items as needed.

checkout.title: Checkout Process
checkout.content: Select payment method (Cash, Card, QR, Lightning). Apply discounts if applicable. Complete the transaction.

tables.title: Table Management
tables.content: For restaurants: Select a table, add orders, split bills, and manage seating.

addProduct.title: Adding Products
addProduct.content: Click "Add Product" to create new items. Fill in name, price, category, and optionally upload an image.

editProduct.title: Editing Products
editProduct.content: Click on any product to edit its details. You can update prices, stock levels, and descriptions.

categories.title: Categories
categories.content: Organize products into categories for easier navigation and reporting.

barcode.title: Barcode Generation
barcode.content: Generate barcodes for products without one. Supports EAN-13, Code128, and QR formats.

inventory.title: Inventory
inventory.description: Track stock levels and manage suppliers

stockLevels.title: Stock Levels
stockLevels.content: View current stock for all products. Items with low stock are highlighted for reordering.

adjustments.title: Stock Adjustments
adjustments.content: Adjust stock for counts, damages, or returns. All changes are logged for auditing.

transfers.title: Branch Transfers
transfers.content: Transfer stock between branches. Select source, destination, and quantities.

purchaseOrders.title: Purchase Orders
purchaseOrders.content: Create POs to order from suppliers. Track status: Draft → Pending → Ordered → Received.

suppliers.title: Suppliers
suppliers.content: Manage supplier contacts, payment terms, and order history.

orderList.title: Order List
orderList.content: View all orders with filters for date, status, and payment method.

orderDetails.title: Order Details
orderDetails.content: Click an order to view items, payment info, and customer details.

refunds.title: Refunds
refunds.content: Process refunds for returned items. Stock is automatically adjusted.

account.title: Account Settings
account.content: Update your profile, change password, and manage Nostr identity.

business.title: Business Settings
business.content: Configure business name, address, tax rates, and receipt settings.

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.content: Connect to Cloudinary for images, configure payment gateways.
